price: ឱមនុស្សលោក. តើអ្វីទៅដែលបានបោកប្រាស់អ្នកឱ្យធ្វើ ស្ហ៊ីរិកចំពោះម្ចាស់របស់អ្នកដ៏ថ្កុំថ្កើង
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ ٱلۡكَرِيمِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-insānu mā gharraka birabbika al-karīmi
